promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive simple falcon electric-type pokemon wearing a ornate crown. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or falcon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crownaptor, a a massive simple falcon electric-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Revenge, Fury Attack. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "falcon", "electric" or "Crownaptor". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, falcon-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, yellow and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This regal avian soars through mountain skies, channeling lightning. With the sun as its crown, it rages fiercely to protect its domain.
